lore: Don't let their polite and friendly nature fool you â€” Spacecats are some of the sharpest minds in the world. And when it comes to money, no one does it better than the Gold Spacecat. These financial wizards manage the entire Spacecat economy, offering top-tier advice on spending and investments. In no time at all, they've made their mark on the economies of Siralim and beyond.
menagerieDialog: (It's curled up in a floating ball, purring contentedly.)
Time to show these earthlings what a real predator looks like!
I've seen things you people wouldn't believe. Want to hear about them?
My space suit is impenetrable! Your puny weapons are no match for me!
(It's zooming around in erratic patterns, defying gravity.)
name: Gold Spacecat
